body: Chichi no Aijin 34 posted on May 1st

Fuck. I have to translate and typeset a doujin all on my own again... Glad that the censorship is a mosaic this time which is more bearable than those shitty black lines or else I have to redraw everything which is a massive pain in the ass.
Where's her friend? Was hoping to see her knocked up with a kid alongside her friend.
There are 5 books in this series, search "Chichi no Aijin."
I am the bone of my sword...

Where's the translation? How could they skip this one when it was published before some of the other chapters? This chapter has been translated to Korean, Chinese and even Spanish, but not English. Am I really gonna have to spend years learning Japanese just so I can know what happens? Also, what's with this "ending"? I refuse to remove the quotations, because there's no way this is how it ends. Midori no Rupe HAS to be coming up with a continuation. Even if he has to publish it independently, he HAS to be thinking about it, right? RIGHT?
I thought that Amae and Aki are living together with Amae's father? why isn't Aki shown living with them?

Translation of the text sent by Amae to Aki... "My baby was born safely. Even now, I'm still happy with my dad. I'm sorry for contacting you like this. As I thought, you're my best friend no matter what happens so I think it would be great if we can make up someday."

Daaaaaamn, they both got knocked up by the bastard.
There's no such a things a s Inbreed in Anime World
translate pls
Someone translate this please.
translations, bitch
We need a deus Ex NOW!!!

@sirflim Aki is her friend at school in chapter 1. u can look her interaction with the father at pg 1 and i think she's not a girl in vid. cause if you look at , in the video the girl wear an uniform which mean she's in middle school(maybe).

well maybe next chapter will tell what happen. but damn as always midori no rupe always make a fucked up story.

It looks like the girl seen in the videos in the first chapter is named Aki, and she at some point had become acquainted with Amae, enough to be considered best friends at this point. Whatever the circumstances are, it seems Aki is rather distressed at the notion of Amae going down the same road she did.

Interested to see where this goes. A bit sad to see Amae go a bit crazy there with the headphones... Guess Aki really has reason to worry.
This is just beginning :)

No rape, no bestiality, no snuff, no netorare.
Midori no rupe, are you alright?
This is where I draw the line
Mama was a farmer, Papa was a goner
Too much time jump!!
